Title: Social witness
Description: Specialized citizens who participate in the surveillance of this contracting process.

Title: Citizen comptroller
Description: Surveillance mechanism by beneficiaries to verify the works progress and the correct expending of public resources.

Title: Internal control unit
Description: Body in charge of preventing, detecting, sanctioning and eradicating corrupt practices that may arise in this contracting process.

Title: External auditor
Description: Institution outside the public administration that performs an audit of this contracting process.
